author: Kim Smith
title: Samantha Bee Cracks Nazi Joke About Student With Brain Cancer
text:
“Day Without a Woman” Closes School District, May Spell Trouble for Parents 
Come to find out, the young man with the haircut, Kyle Coddington, 20, isn’t sporting the look to make some kind of statement — he has stage 4 glioblastoma, an aggressive form of brain cancer for which there is no known cure. 
The show attacked someone for the way they looked. Who could possibly have guessed that would go wrong? 
Many people rightfully thought the segment was tasteless.   
Coddington’s sister, Megan, even called out the show. When @iamsambee makes fun of your brother for having "Nazi hair." He actually has stage 4 brain cancer, but whatever floats your boat. pic.twitter.com/ULJC8nA3IX 
— Megan Coddington (@meg_kelly16) March 9, 2017 
The show issued an apology on social media and removed the segment that included him from the piece. We deeply apologize for offending @_that_kyle in our CPAC segment. We only learned of his condition today & have removed him from the piece. 
— Full Frontal (@FullFrontalSamB) March 9, 2017 
That’s the least they could do. The show also apparently donated $1,000 to Coddington’s GoFundMe account.
